CustomField.formula: CASE( 1 , IF( Story_Points__c >= 500, 1, 0), "Level 9", IF( Story_Points__c >= 300, 1, 0), "Level 8", IF( Story_Points__c >= 200, 1, 0), "Level 7", IF( Story_Points__c >= 150, 1, 0), "Level 6", IF( Story_Points__c >= 100, 1, 0), "Level 5", IF( Story_Points__c >= 50, 1, 0), "Level 4", IF( Story_Points__c >= 30, 1, 0), "Level 3", IF( Story_Points__c >= 10, 1, 0), "Level 2", "Level 1")
CustomField.label: Time Mastery
